price: 64. Mas cuando Nuestro castigo se abata sobre sus ricos dirigentes, Nos suplicarán con humildad.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذۡنَا مُتۡرَفِيهِم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمۡ يَجۡـَٔرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā akhadhnā mut'rafīhim bil-ʿadhābi idhā hum yajarūna
